features.name: Agency Page
features.description: Main agency page with animated team member images, scroll-triggered animations, timeline section, and footer with social links and contact information

features.name: Timeline Component
features.description: Animated timeline component using Framer Motion for displaying project information with scroll-based animations

features.name: Navigation
features.description: Navigation components including navbar and full-screen navigation menu

features.name: Contact Page
features.description: Contact page with form, contact information, and animated footer

features.name: Home Page
features.description: Home page with hero text, video, and bottom text components

features.name: App Router
features.description: Main application router configuration with routes for different pages

features.name: GSAP Animations
features.description: Scroll-triggered animations using GSAP and ScrollTrigger plugin for smooth scrolling effects

features.name: Footer Component
features.description: Footer with social media links, contact button, time display, policy links, and back to top button
